archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Categorize Service Alarm Event
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process is responsible for categorizing the service alarm events in order to support the management, filtering and correlation of events at SM&O level. Extended Description This process is responsible for categorizing the service alarm events in order to support the management, filtering and correlation of events at SM&O level. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use.
